page.title: 18Tower Block,Bradford
page.content: York House has been built for 30 years and has had 27 years of vandalism.When it was first built it was nice but vandals sprayed on the walls,windows were smashed and the lift was always out of order.People complained about the lack of security.People could just walk in through any of the 4 entrances.Many people inside the flats were scared and some left.After many complaints the council gave the go ahead and had it cleaned and repainted.This was stopped because of cuts until 3 years ago. York House has now been improved a lot.It has been painted in 2 shades of brown and white.There is only one entrance with security guards and 4 security cameras.A new lift and windows have been installed.
